properties.displayName: Azure Purview Accounts should disable public network access
properties.description: Disable public network access for your Azure Purview Accounts so that it's not accessible over the public internet. This can reduce data leakage risks

metadata.description: 'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
